Package org.fosstrak.reader.rprm.core.triggers

Class Summary
ContinuousNotificationThread This is the implementation of the thread used by a continuous notification trigger.
ContinuousReadThread This is the implementation of the thread uses by a continuous read trigger.
IOEdgeTriggerPortManager This class represents the io edge trigger manager and implements some important methods to notify the triggers.
IOTriggerPortManager The abstract class of the io triggers.
IOValueTriggerPortManager This class represents the io value triggers manager and implements some important methods to notify the triggers.
KeyIOEdgeTriggerPortManager This is a sample of a key trigger manager.
TimerNotificationThread This class is the implementation of the thread used by the notification timer trigger.
TimerReadThread This class is the implementation of the thread userd by the read timer trigger.
